name: llm-background-diagnostics
description: VS Code extension for automatic background diagnostics using LLMs.

llmBugDetector.enabled.description: Enables or disables the automatic background analysis.

llmBugDetector.model.description: (If VS Code API allows selection) Specifies the LLM model to use for analysis. If empty, the extension may attempt to select a default model.

llmBugDetector.analysisInterval.description: Sets the interval (in milliseconds) between background analyses after a document change. (Default: 3000ms)

llmBugDetector.languages.description: Specifies the programming languages for which the analysis should be active (e.g., ["typescript", "python"]). An empty array means all languages where the extension is activated.
